About Us

Late Shri Pandit T.N. Mishra, alongside his wife Smt. Shashi Mishra, laid the foundation of Central Academy School in 1973 in Jaipur, marking the inception of a legacy that now spans over 50 branches nationwide, a testament to his vision and dedication
